questions.message: 1. Age at Release from Index Sex Offence: is required
2. Ever lived with lover for at least 2 years?: is required
3. Index offence non-sexual violence (convictions only): is required
4. Prior non-sexual violence (convictions only): is required
5. Prior sex offence convictions (excluding index)</br>Use directions provided on the manual form (e.g., Do not count index offence(s).: is required
6. Prior sentencing dates (excluding index): is required
7. Any convictions for non-contact sex offences: is required
